Constructor Detail

TextComponent

public TextComponent()
Creates a new instance of TextComponent. By default, no call to updateAppearance is made in the construction of this component.

Method Detail

setAppearance

public void setAppearance(ComponentAppearance appearance)
Sets the appearance for this text component. If appearance is not an instance of TextComponentAppearance, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
